// Store definition
const useCounterStore = create((set) => ({
  count: 0,
  history: [],
  increment: () => set((state) => ({
    count: state.count + 1,
    history: [...state.history, `Incremented to ${state.count + 1}`]
  }))
}));

// React component
function Counter() {
  const { count, history, increment } = useCounterStore();
  
  return (
    <div>
      <p>Count: {count}</p>
      <button onClick={increment}>
        Increment
      </button>
    </div>
  );
}
